message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I am interested in purchasing it, but I would like to negotiate the price. Can we agree on $120?
I understand you're looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $140? I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I believe the product offers, I would like to propose a price of $130. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can we discuss $135?

Hello Alice, I understand your position and I respect your pricing. I would like to propose a final offer of $130. This price reflects my valuation of the product and I hope it will be acceptable to you.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $137, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. This is my final offer. Can you accept?
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer and I would like to propose a final price of $135. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
I'm not willing to go below $138, Bob. This is my last offer. I'm confident that this price is fair for both of us. Can you accept?
Hello Alice, after careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $136. I hope this offer will be acceptable to you and we can conclude our negotiations.
